title: Retrieve Additional Directorship Dividend Data Response

companyDirector.description: Indicates whether a taxable entity is a director or not.

closeCompany.description: Indicates whether the company is a close company. This field is only returned when companyDirector is true.

directorshipCeasedDate.description: Date when the directorship ceased. This will cease the rollover across tax years for custom employments that were created for Additional Dividends and Directorship. It must be provided in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

companyName.description: The name by which the company is registered with Companies House. This field is only returned when closeCompany is true.

companyNumber.description: The number by which the company is registered with Companies House. This field is only returned when closeCompany is true.

shareholding.description: The percentage shareholding of the company. This field is only returned when closeCompany is true. A value of 0 indicates no shareholding.

dividendReceived.description: The amount of dividends received from the company. This field is only returned when closeCompany is true. A value of 0 indicates no dividends were received.

submittedOn.description: The date and time of the submission. It must provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ
